newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA-STOCKS SUSPENDED ON SHARE MARKET.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA-STOCKS SUSPENDED ON SHARE MARKET.

text.p: Lithuania's stock exchange said its board decided on Monday to suspend the trading of the securities of the following companies:
- Siauliu Bank, March 17-24, at issuer's request because of general shareholders' meeting.
- Liteksas and Calw, March 17-25, at issuer's request because of shareholder meeting.
- Grigiskes, March 17-25, at issuer's request because of shareholder meeting.
- Rokishkio Cheese, from March 18 for three trading sessions to assimilate the company's share issues. After renewing the trading price, fluctuation margins are not applied.
- Grafobal Vilnius, March 18, due shareholder meeting.
- Lietuva hotel, for March 18, due shareholder meeting.
- Ekranas TV tubes producer, March 18-26, at issuer's request due to shareholder meeting.
- Krekenavos Agro-company, March 18-21, at issuer's request because of shareholder meeting.
- Lietuvos Energija, March 19-27, at issuer's request due to shareholder meeting.
- Litimpeks bank, March 19-27, at issuer's request due to shareholder meeting.
- Ukio Bank, March 20-28, at issuer's request due to shareholder meeting.
- Hermis Bank, March 20-28, at issuer's request due to shareholder meeting.
- Agricultural Bank, March 20-28, at issuer's request due to shareholder meeting.
